original_title: Razbunarea tigancii - Palaria fatala si nazistul
overview: Somewhere next to the citadel walls, a flower selling gypsy, probably a witch, has an apocalyptic vision: In a very short time, tens of thousand of gypsies from Hungary and Romania will be killed or deported. She decides to use her powers to help them.
tagline: A witch uses gypsy magic to stop the nazis
title: The Gypsy Revenge - The Deadly Hat and the Nazi
